entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
